articles.title: How much salary hike will you get this year? Here's what to expect - Hindustan Times

articles.author: INDIATODAY
articles.title: Top 5 safest SUVs on Indian roads - India Today
articles.description: The Tata Safari, Tata Harrier, Tata Nexon, Volkswagen Taigun and Skoda Kushaq are the five safest SUVs on sale in India right now, as per their crash test results at Global NCAP.
articles.content: Global NCAP's updated crash test protocols assess frontal and side impact protection, pedestrian protection, side pole impact protection and electronic stability control (ESC), among others.
